item.description:
A Message from Tower Hill Botanical Garden - they will be celebrating the last opportunity to witness a rare transit of Venus event in this Century on Tuesday June 5th 2012! Aldrich Astronomical Society, Inc. will have a display table at the event - your next opportunity will not occur until 2117! Plan to attend because even if the weather does not cooperate, they will post the event in their viewing hall from a site on the internet from NASA! Plus, Aldrich will have handouts and plenty of information about the Transit of Venus.

Hello,
This is to let you know about a special event we are having at Tower Hill to view the transit of Venus on June 5. Details are here:
https://dnbweb1.blackbaud.com/OPXREPHIL/EventDetail.asp?cguid=C7E2C131-AD0F-49AA-B073-5B92F8300A37&eid=42288&sid=D23E7B9F-C678-4BF2-993A-2E97E9DA13DA
We invite your members to join us as we have an ideal spot for viewing. If anyone would be willing to add to our event with hands-on activities or equipment, please have them contact me.
Thank you,
Ann Marie Pilch
Education Director
Tower Hill Botanic Garden
11 French Dr.
P.O. Box 598
Boylston, MA 01505
Phone: 508-869-6111, ext. 120
Fax: 508-869-0314
www.towerhillbg.org
item.name: Tower Hill Botanical Garden Transit of Venus!
